com.radirius.mercury.utilities.command

Class CommandList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.utilities.command.CommandList

  • public class CommandList
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of Commands and Variables to be accessed in the given InputStream (the console by default).
    Author:
    wessles

        public java.lang.String manual
        The manual that will be shown when requested by the console user. Used for general instruction of using the command list.
